text: This is a list of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Mali. __NOTOC__ == List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Formation !! Period !! Fossils !! class="unsortable" | Notes |- | Continental Terminal Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Lutetian || Moeritherium sp., Cubitostrea multicostata || align=center | Tafidet at Fossilworks.org |- | Tamaguélelt Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Ypresian || Palaeophis colossaeus, Phosphatosaurus gavialoides, Tilemsisuchus lavocati, Numidotheriidae indet., Pliohyracidae indet., ?Proboscidea indet. || align=center | Tamaguélelt at Fossilworks.orgButte de Tamaguilelt at Fossilworks.orgTamaguélelt 2 at Fossilworks.org |- | Teberemt Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Paleocene || Acleistochelys maliensis, Azabbaremys moragjonesi, Hyposaurus sp., Crocodylomorpha indet., Cubitostrea multicostata, Linthia sudanensis, Deltoidonautilus sp. || align=center | Samit, north of In Fargas at Fossilworks.orgGao Trench locality 2 at Fossilworks.org |- | Continental Intercalaire Formation || style="background- color: ;" | Berriasian || cf. Sarcosuchus sp., Crocodylia indet., Lithostrotia indet., Sauropoda indet., Testudines indet. || align=center | Lapparent site 30c, Tilemsi at Fossilworks.orgMali12, Tilemsi Valley at Fossilworks.org |- |} == See also == * Lists of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Africa ** List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Guinea ** List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Ivory Coast ** List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Mauritania ** List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Niger ** List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Senegal * Geology of Mali == References == == Further reading == * E. title: List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in Mali
